description: Try our easy to follow Passionfruit Coconut Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Passionfruit Coconut Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 egg (save 5 egg yolks; save 5 egg whites for meringue)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter with passionfruit pulp, sugar and cornflour in a saucepan over mediumlow heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved.

Whisk together whole egg and egg yolks in a large bowl until combined. Slowly add passionfruit butter in a steady stream, whisking to combine. Transfer back to pan and stir constantly over mediumlow heat, until bubbles appear around the edge. Transfer to a metal bowl and place into iced water to cool quickly, stirring occasionally, until cold.
Beat cream until thick with stiff peaks. Fold into passionfruit mixture. Refrigerate until chilled.

Meanwhile, to make meringue, preheat oven to 120Â°C. Draw 2 x 19.5cm circles onto 2 sheets baking paper and place onto baking trays. Combine coconut with cornflour. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gradually add sugar and beat for 5 minutes or until thick and glossy. Fold in coconut mixture. Spread meringue mixture onto the circles and smooth surfaces. Bake for 1 hour or until crisp. Leave in oven with door ajar for 2 hours to cool slowly.

To assemble, line a 20cm round springform tin with plastic wrap. Place one meringue layer into base. Top with passionfruit mousse and second meringue layer, pressing gently. Cover pan and freeze overnight.
To serve, remove from pan and invert onto a serving plate. Cut into wedges. Drizzle with extra passionfruit pulp to serve.
